algorithm_technique: Hashmap to store counts, iterate through powers of 2 to find complements.
problem_summary_simple: Count pairs of food items whose deliciousness sums to a power of two.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a hashmap to store frequencies of deliciousness values and iterates through powers of two to find complementary pairs.
key_insights: The maximum sum of two deliciousness values is bounded, so we only need to check powers of two up to that bound.
A hashmap (Counter) is efficient for storing and retrieving frequencies of deliciousness values.
The modulo operation is crucial for handling large results.
